sentences.en: a pub that tries to recreate the flavour of olde England
sentences.cn: 一家力图重现古英格兰风情的酒馆

sentences.en: I am trying to recreate family life far from home.
sentences.cn: 我正试图在远离家园的地方重建家庭生活。

sentences.en: I often recreate myself with gardening.
Most efforts are using Java, ActiveX, or proprietary browser plug - ins to recreate the classroom experience.
sentences.cn: 多数研究是利用Java 、 ActiveX或者专有的浏览器插入程序来重现课堂实践.

sentences.en: Never recreate places from your memory. Always imagine new places!
sentences.cn: 不要记忆重塑梦境. 统统想像出全新的场景.

sentences.en: New ball physics accurately recreate bouncing, skidding and topspin.
sentences.cn: 球的新的物理性能精准地再现球的反弹, 滑动和上旋.

sentences.en: On weekends I play; The students all recreate alike.
sentences.cn: 周末我会出去玩; 学生玩得差不多.
所有学生都痛痛快快玩了一番.

sentences.en: They have everything needed to recreate any of the items described here.
sentences.cn: 他们已经可以制造这儿描述的任何物品了.

sentences.en: They wanted to recreate the ability of lotus leaves to resist water.
sentences.cn: 他们想再造荷叶防水的特性.

sentences.en: This is also a opportunity for teachers to reconsider and recreate mathematics.
sentences.cn: 这一过程也是教师思索和再创造的机会.

sentences.en: Update views in the model ( Recreate the dropped changed views. ).
sentences.cn: 更新模型中的视图 ( 重新创建已删除且发生更改的视图 ).

sentences.en: We scrutinize the crime scene, collect the evidence recreate what happened without ever having been there.
sentences.cn: 我们仔细检查犯罪现场, 收集证据并重建犯罪过程.

sentences.en: We want to recreate the romance and excitement that used to be part of rail journeys.
sentences.cn: 我们想再度营造以前坐火车旅行的浪漫和兴奋。

sentences.en: You can never recreate the feeling of winning for the first time.
sentences.cn: 你永远无法再次体会第一次获胜时的心情。

sentences.en: You can recreate the clustered index error.
sentences.cn: 聚簇索引的问题,可以删除了重建.

trans.tran_cn: 重现，重建，再创造，娱乐；消遣

trans.tran_en: to make something from the past exist again in a new form or be experienced again
